lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Sunday about the University of Connecticut football team’s victory in the PapaJohns.com Bowl last Saturday at the end of an emotional season described incorrectly the fight that led to the stabbing death of defensive back Jasper Howard on Oct. 18. It was on campus, outside a university-sponsored dance at the student union; it was not off campus.
